name: Yummy Mahjong
description:
Yummy mahjong is a game for fans of the mahjong connect genre. On each level, you will have to collect the same pair of treats to clear the playing field and gain access to a new level. Be careful when choosing, the success of the passage depends on it. And if you get confused, you can always use a hint or shuffle!


Features:
- Nice graphics
- Nice soundtrack
